meanings.definition: To make clean and hygienic by destroying bacteria or germs.
meanings.sent1: She sanitizes her hands before eating to keep them free from germs.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff sanitizes all medical equipment to prevent infections.
meanings.sent3: The robot chef sanitizes the kitchen with laser beams, ensuring a germ-free environment.
meanings.sent4: His smile sanitizes the room, spreading positivity and warmth to everyone present.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's power to sanitizes evil from the world made him a beloved protector of the city.

meanings.sent1: He sanitizes his tools after every use to maintain their cleanliness.
meanings.sent2: The maid sanitizes the hotel rooms to ensure a comfortable stay for guests.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to help and sanitizes the spilled milk by licking it up.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sanitizes the tension in the room, making everyone relax and smile.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays seem to sanitizes the earth, bringing warmth and light to all living things.
